embedding - based QA system.developed under: framework of Memory Networks ( Mem NNs )
embedding - based QA system.from sentence: Second , in sections 3 and 4 , we present an embedding - based QA system developed under the framework of Memory Networks ( Mem NNs ) .

between: input and response languages ( here natural language )
storage language ( here , the facts from KBs )

Memory Networks.from sentence: Memory Networks are learning systems centered around a memory component that can be read and written to , with a particular focus on cases where the relationship between the input and response languages ( here natural language ) and the storage language ( here , the facts from KBs ) is performed by embedding all of them in the same vector space .

simple QA.from sentence: The setting of the simple QA corresponds to the elementary operation of performing a single lookup in the memory .
